mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(1) normal FROM assets_item WHERE status = 1) AS a1, (SELECT count(1) borrow FROM assets_item WHERE status = 2) AS a2, (SELECT count(1) maintenance FROM assets_item WHERE status = 3) AS a3, (SELECT count(1) abandoned FROM assets_item WHERE status = 4) AS a4

SELECT a.date, ifnull(a.borrowNum,0) borrowNum, ifnull(b.returnNum,0) returnNum FROM (SELECT date,any_value(borrowNum) borrowNum FROM (SELECT date_format(ab.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') date, count(1) borrowNum FROM assets_borrow ab WHERE ab.create_time >= #{startTime} AND ab.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY date
UNION (SELECT date_format(#{item},'%Y-%m-%d'),0)
) AS bu GROUP BY bu.date ) AS a
LEFT JOIN (SELECT date_format(ab2.return_time,'%Y-%m-%d') date, count(1) returnNum FROM assets_borrow ab2 WHERE ab2.return_time >= #{startTime} AND ab2.return_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY date ) AS b ON a.date = b.date
ORDER BY date ASC
